post.description: Once accounts are created they are stored temporarily for 2 hours before deletion if email verification is not completed

schema.title: Response Send Otp Api V1 Auth Send Otp Post

post.description:
Token returned from this endpoint is valid for only `5 minutes`

Once the OTP is verified the token is blacklisted

These tokens carry a scope that allows only actions that need OTP verification therefore cannot be used elsewhere

put.description: This endpoint refreshes a user's token including the neccesary permissions for the account type,in case of unauthorized or account type changes The previous token will be `blacklisted`

pick the target field and exclude the rest,
the server will dynamically update,all fields are optional

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of available properties using cursor-based pagination. Users can filter results based on specific criteria, such as property ID, and define the number of listings returned per request. The response includes a `next_cursor` to facilitate seamless pagination.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: The amount of listings to fetch
schema.title: Limit

parameters.name: cursor

schema.description: The Id of the last listing
